QuestData.Title: Never Forget
QuestData.Description: We had to escape Telmor with what few we could save.$B$BSomeone disabled Leafshadow's cloaking field; I know not who, but I suspect it had to have been one of our own.$B$BWe will retrieve our livelihoods in time, but we cannot risk losing our sacred artifacts.$B$BIf you are able, bring Leafshadow, our town registry, and our prayerbook to safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Telmor Registry, the Auchenai Prayerbook, and Leafshadow in Telmor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Some things are worth fighting for, $r. These are such things.
QuestData.RewardText: With these, we can account for our fallen and rebuild. We will persevere.
